testcase.name: To validate the new pet creation in pet service
Search for Pet id which is not available
Invalid input to create pet service
testcase.system-err: expected:<405> but was:<200> com.api.automation.steps.PetServiceSteps.validateResponseForCreatePet(PetServiceSteps.java:37) ✽.The status of the create pet response should be 405(src/test/resources/stories/apiFeatures/PetServiceScenarios.feature:55)

testcase.name: Updating an unavailable pet id
